<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1556) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Charmed Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=1523)

</column>

---

You always seem to bounce back from the worst. When you use [Charmed Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=1523), roll the save twice (including the +2 circumstance bonus from Charmed Life) and use the better result.
name: Incredible Luck
